thread.title: Battle over bodies in Iraq's Mosul, long after I.S. defeat

title: Battle over bodies in Iraq's Mosul, long after I.S. defeat
text:
Battle over bodies in Iraq's Mosul, long after I.S. defeat Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 02:05 
The Iraqis who have come home to Mosul's Old City knew it would be hard living in the rubble left by the battle against Islamic State, but there is one aspect of their surroundings they are finding unbearable seven months on: the thousands of bodies that still litter neighborhoods.
